title.@value: Umbilical cutis or polyp of newborn

definition.@value: An umbilical cord polyp is a congenital lesion resulting from persistence of the omphalomesenteric duct. It originates from either the omphalomesenteric duct or from urachal remnants. The polyp may contain intestinal mucosa.

label.@value: Umbilical cutis or polyp of newborn
